entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 12.
